title: Philly Not So Special? Plus the Sneaky Good Titans and More Week 4 Reactions  | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 312)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark open the show with reactions to Ravens-Steelers, Eagles-Titans, and Tyler Eifert’s gruesome injury before discussing whose stock you should buy or sell after Week 4 (hint: buy Mitchell Trubisky stock!) (2:00). Then the guys throw challenge flags on judging young QBs, the Giants as a team in general, and the Earl Thomas situation before predicting tomorrow’s headlines (46:30).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
